thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Brandi Ellis

author: Brandi Ellis
title: Brandi Ellis
text: I purchased a vehicle a week ago yesterday. I have to say that the customer service was on point from the minute I made the appointment to view what they had to offer. Kenyen was the gentleman that assisted me and gave impeccable customer service! He thoroughly explained all of my options and answered all questions I had. The entire experience made me feel like there are people out there who really care about giving excellent customer service. I appreciate each and every individual I spoke with over the phone and in the building. I would definitely recommend anyone I know. These are some wonderful employees who love what they do!
